common.return_sentence: We will gladly accept returns post marked within 10 days of purchase. Merchandise eligible must be in its original condition, with all hang tags and care labels attached. Merchandise which has been worn, altered or damaged is not returnable.

footer.do_not_reply: Please do not reply to this email

return_receipt.title: Return Receipt
return_receipt.credit_card_note: Please note, credit card refunds may take a few days to be reflected on your account due to bank processing time.

consumer_capture_email.title: Your Receipt from Frank And Oak
consumer_capture_email.text2: , we hope you love the purchase you made today. Please see attached for your receipt.

consumer_capture_email_subject.subject: Your Frank And Oak purchase receipt is enclosed

return_receipt_email.title: Order item returned
return_receipt_email.header: Item(s) in your order have been returned.
return_receipt_email.text2: , please allow for 10 business days as we process your refund. Please see attached for your receipt.
return_receipt_email.text3: Refunds will be issued to to the original credit card used to place the order for merchandise that comply with our Returns Policy.
return_receipt_email.text4: All custom fees, duties, and taxes are non-refundable.
return_receipt_email.text5: The amount will be reflected on your next credit card statement, according to the billing cycle.

order_cancelled_email.title: Order Cancellation
order_cancelled_email.header: The cancellation of your order is confirmed.
order_cancelled_email.text1: The following items have been cancelled from your order #

order_cancelled_email_subject.subject2: has been partially or fully cancelled
